channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: What if the real risk of AI isn’t deepfakes — but daily whispers?
item.description: Most people don’t appreciate the profound threat that AI will soon pose to human agency. A common refrain is that “AI is just a tool,” and like any tool, its benefits and dangers depend on how people use it. This is old-school thinking. AI is transitioning from tools we use to prosthetics we wear. This will create significant new threats we’re just not prepared for.No, I’m not talking about creepy brain implants. These AI-powered prosthetics will be mainstream products we buy from Amazon or the Apple Store and marketed with friendly names like “assistants,” “coaches,” “co-pilots” and “tutors.”...

item.title: Seulement 56 € pour cette barre barre de son 2.0 Hisense compatible Dolby Audio
item.description: Le Hisense HS1000 est une barre de son qui ne paie pas de mine au premier abord, mais qui peut délivrer une puissance audio de 120 W. Chez Amazon, il chute à 56,05 euros.

item.title: Kalshi voids some bets on Khamenei’s ouster because it’s ‘directly tied to death’
item.description: In a statement on X, Kalshi CEO Tarek Mansour said his company would pay out positions on "Ali Khamenei out as Supreme Leader?" at the last trading price before his death. Mansour said that Kalshi doesn't "list markets directly tied to death" and that its rules are designed to "prevent people from profiting from death." […]

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs écrans portables pour PC, Mac, smartphones et Switch 2 en 2026 ?
item.description: Assez méconnus, les écrans portables (ou « moniteurs externes ») ont de plus en plus le vent en poupe. Il faut dire que les caractéristiques de leurs dalles se sont améliorées et que la connectique USB-C avec DisplayPort a ouvert des possibilités. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs écrans portables.

item.title: Expert responsiveness and weighing next to nothing, the Razer Kitsune is very easy to recommend — though I would suggest waiting for a sale
item.description: The Razer Kitsune is a top-shelf leverless controller from a brand familiar with luxury; just expect to be paying a luxurious price as a result.

item.title: Rivian Announces ‘RAD’ Engineering Team That Tests the Extremes of the Company’s EVs
item.description: RAD puts vehicles in places and situations they'll probably never see in most customers' hands.

item.title: The 5 Big ‘Known Unknowns’ of Donald Trump’s New War With Iran
item.description: The all-out air assault on the Islamic Republic might be the biggest gamble of the president’s career.

item.title: Google looks to tackle longstanding RCS spam in India — but not alone
item.description: Google is integrating carrier-level filtering into RCS in India through a partnership with Airtel to strengthen protections against spam.

item.title: The new Nvidia age has begun — first Vera Rubin AI chips are rolling out to customers, now let's see what they can do with it
item.description: Nvidia’s Vera Rubin AI chips reach first customers, combining CPU, GPU, and networking for high-performance AI workloads in data centers.

item.title: The US reportedly used Anthropic's AI for its attack on Iran, just after banning it
item.description: In a lengthy post on Truth Social on February 27, President Trump ordered all federal agencies to "immediately cease all use of Anthropic's technology" following strong disagreements between the Department of Defense and the AI company. A few hours later, the US conducted a major air attack on Iran with the help of Anthropic's AI tools, according to a report from The Wall Street Journal. The president noted in his post that there would be a "six-month phase-out period for agencies like the Department of War who are using Anthropic’s products," so federal agencies are still expected to eventual...

item.title: Radio Silence Wanted Their ‘Scream 7’ to Stab Your Teeth In
item.description: If you thought 'Scream 5' and ''6' were too nice, Radio Silence seemed to agree and would've made 'Scream 7' mean as hell.

item.title: Investors spill what they aren’t looking for anymore in AI SaaS companies
item.description: TechCrunch spoke with VCs to learn what investors aren't looking for in AI SaaS startups anymore.

item.title: OnePlus 15R vs Samsung Galaxy S25 FE : comment choisir le meilleur smartphone haut de gamme ?
item.description: Samsung jouit d'une très solide réputation sur le haut de gamme. Mais, qu'en est-il sur le segment du milieu de gamme avancé ? Comparons le OnePlus 15R au S25 FE pour connaître la réponse.

item.title: Everything announced at MWC 2026: Honor's Robot Phone, the new Leica Leitzphone by Xiaomi, and more
item.description: MWC 2026 officially gets underway on March 2 and will continue through March 5, but the announcements are already coming ahead of its start. We can always count on the annual tech event to bring tons of new phones, laptops and tablets, and we're expecting to see some robots and other gadgets too — plus plenty of AI news, of course. In addition to the announcements, MWC is our chance to get hands-on time with some of the most interesting new devices, like the Xiaomi 17 Ultra and Honor's Robot Phone.Engadget’s Mat Smith is on the ground in Barcelona, and we'll be updating this story as the week ...
